name: Pegs 2
description:
Push blocks to solve puzzles.

This is an enhanced port of a calculator game released in 2001. Produced by Detached Solutions, it was released as part of a collection of four puzzle games called PuzzPack. Here is a website about the original.

The latest update now includes an undo feature, new effects, and the full levelset from the original game.

Controls:

Directions to move and push blocks.

A key (X button on console or on mobile) to undo, or hold it to restart the level.

X key (B button on console or mobile) to toggle Classic Mode, for visuals and effects more true to the original calculator game.

Note:
Not tested on mobile.
